name: Friends of the Supergrid
memberOrga: FOSG members include: AES Storage, ACS-Cobra, Bernard EnergyAdvocacy, ELES, GE, WSP,  RTE-France, Siemens,  Tideway, Eunice Energy Group, Philippe & Partners law firm, VBMS.
goal: Friends of the Supergrid is a group of companies and organisations with a mutual interest in promoting the policy agenda for a European Supergrid
interests: Climate Action, Education, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
EU Energy Union
2030 Energy and Climate Framework
Interconnection targets
PCI & TYNDP & CEF
EFSI
